description:
This tool searches the web for relevant results to use in a response. Learn more
about the
[web search tool](https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/tools-web-search).

type.description:
The type of the web search tool. One of `web_search_preview` or
`web_search_preview_2025_03_11`.

search_context_size.description:
High level guidance for the amount of context window space to use for the
search. One of `low`, `medium`, or `high`. `medium` is the default.

type.description: The type of location approximation. Always `approximate`.

city.description: Free text input for the city of the user, e.g. `San Francisco`.

country.description:
The two-letter [ISO country code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1) of
the user, e.g. `US`.

region.description: Free text input for the region of the user, e.g. `California`.
